description: Slack integration for receiving messages and sending formatted responses with buttons

optional_params.name: channel_id
optional_params.description: Slack channel or thread ID to send to

optional_params.name: blocks
optional_params.description: Slack Block Kit formatted message blocks

optional_params.name: thread_ts
optional_params.description: Thread timestamp for replying in thread

error_codes.SEND_FAILED: Message didn't send. Please try again.
error_codes.INVALID_BLOCKS: Message formatting error. Using plain text instead.
error_codes.RATE_LIMITED: Too many messages. Please wait a moment.

usage_notes: Use Block Kit for rich formatting (images, sections, dividers)
Confirmation messages should use action buttons for Yes/Cancel
Parse both top-level messages and thread replies
Support @mentions and slash commands if configured
Format article lists as blocks with titles and excerpts
Show image previews when sharing hero images
